CustomField.formula:
IF( (LimitsCalloutsUsed__c / LimitsCalloutsMax__c * 100) >= 90, "⛔", IF( (LimitsCalloutsUsed__c / LimitsCalloutsMax__c * 100) < 90 && (LimitsCalloutsUsed__c / LimitsCalloutsMax__c * 100) >= 80, "⚠️", "✅" ) ) + ' ' +
TEXT(LimitsCalloutsUsed__c) + ' / ' + TEXT(LimitsCalloutsMax__c) + ' (' + TEXT(ROUND(LimitsCalloutsUsed__c / LimitsCalloutsMax__c * 100, 2)) + '%)'
CustomField.label: Callouts
